Prev: Timothy wades in the lagoon Up: Pfeiffer Beach, June 26, 2001 Next: Family from above

Near and far



Looking down from halfway up one of the outcroppings on the beach.
Taken Tuesday, June 26, 2001, 12:42:39pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 989kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/125s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 45mm
